product_title: Campus Men's North Plus Running Shoes
product_details: The Campus Men's North Plus Running Shoes feature a lightweight and breathable design, making them ideal for long-distance running. With responsive cushioning and durable construction, these shoes provide comfort and support mile after mile.

The Campus Men's Hurricane Running Shoes are designed for stability and support during high-intensity workouts. Featuring a cushioned midsole and durable outsole, these shoes provide reliable performance in any activity.

product_title: Maxima Max Pro X5 Smartwatch-Premium Ultra Slim
product_details: The Maxima Max Pro X5 Smartwatch combines sleek design with advanced features. With its ultra-slim profile and premium materials, this smartwatch offers both style and functionality. Stay connected and track your fitness goals with ease.

product_title: Fire-Boltt Phoenix Smart Watch with Bluetooth Calling
product_details: The Fire-Boltt Phoenix Smart Watch offers seamless Bluetooth calling and fitness tracking in a sleek and stylish design. Stay connected and motivated with this versatile smartwatch.

product_title: Samsung Galaxy M15 5G (Blue Topaz,4GB RAM,128GB Storage)| 50MP Triple Cam| 6000mAh Battery
product_details: The Samsung Galaxy M15 5G features a stunning 50MP triple camera setup, a powerful 6000mAh battery, and ultra-fast 5G connectivity. With its sleek design and premium features, this smartphone is perfect for capturing life's moments and staying connected on the go.

product_title: OPPO A38 (Glowing Gold, 4GB RAM, 128GB Storage) | 5000 mAh Battery and 33W SUPERVOOC
product_details: The OPPO A38 features a vibrant 6.5-inch display, a powerful 5000mAh battery, and fast charging technology for all-day use. With its sleek design and advanced features, this smartphone offers an exceptional user experience.
